data.message: Just donated Great Idea! keep it up Mark Zuckerberg

replies.message: Thank you for joining the fight against Ebola, Jose. Your donation will help support the heroes on the ground working to stop the spread of one of the biggest public health crises facing the world. -Jenny
Dear Facebook team, we are looking forward to receiving a verified badge for the European Union Agency for Fundamental Rights !
Facebook: How come friend requests can no longer be ignored? It now displays "Delete Request". There are some I don't want to accept right now and don't want to see. Bring this feature back.
